ygData.subject: Re: Where are we?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lokk turns to his friends, Ok guys, strap yourselves in, we re going to try to land. He straps himself into a seat in front of the control panels. Axis

::Axis/Lokk::

Lokk turns to his friends, "Ok guys, strap yourselves in, we're 
going to try to land." He straps himself into a seat in front of the 
control panels. Axis straps himself into another seat, behind and 
left of Lokk. They both wait for Seekker.


On 22 Apr 2001, at 21:48, gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::Seeker::
> Seekker continuedto stare out the window.
> "OOH...Pretty lights flashing....hehe ....boom!" he screamed the last 
> part after alrge flash erupted from the light show...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Axis/Lokk::
> > 
> > Lokk frowns at Seekker, and turns back to the control panel. He 
> > presses a few buttons and another holo appears, this time of Earth. 
> > "This is Earth." he says to his companions, "This place looks more 
> > inviting than the other planet we were headed too, lets stop here." 
> > Axis agrees with him "Yup yup,"
> > 
> > 
> > On 22 Apr 2001, at 20:22, gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > 
> > > ::Seekker::
> > > Seekker runs to the window and takes a look...
> > > "Huh...what do you htink this planet is...haha"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > ::Axis/Lokk::
> > > > 
> > > > Lokk reaches the control panel, and shuts off the boosters and 
> > > > grabs onto the edges of the control center. Axis grabs the 
> cieling 
> > > > handles as the craft slows down. Lokk looks at the small 
> disply, 
> > > > then looks out the window of the craft. "Uhh, guys, something 
> tells 
> > > > me that this planet," he points a hologram of Akaron 4, a grey 
> and 
> > > > mostly void of life exile planet that they were supposed to be 
> > > > heading to, "isn't the one out side in front of us," He lowers 
> his 
> > > > hand, and stares out the window at a magnificent colourful 
> planet 
> > > > with frosty pure white spears and twirls of water vapour, so 
> much 
> > > > deep blue that it envelopes the optics, massive earthy 
> continents, 
> > > > and, he noticed a light show (CF battle) down near what looked 
> like 
> > > > the tip a large continent. "Hey guys, look there," he points to 
> the 
> > > > battle at the CF unknowingly."Seekker, Axis, take a look at 
> that!"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > On 22 Apr 2001, at 7:49, gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > > ::Seekker::
> > > > > Seeker also forces his way with Lokk.
> > > > > "hehe...dumb bot...ha..ahaha..."
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > ::???/???::
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Three bots look out the veiw ports of their ship. The 
> larger of 
> > > the 
> > > > > > three moves away from the veiw port, and looks at the 
> controls 
> > > of 
> > > > > > their ship, "Uhhh, which one is the steering thingy?" He 
> looks 
> > > at 
> > > > > > several buttons, and a couple other switches and possible 
> > > control 
> > > > > > sticks. He decides to choose, as one of the other bots at 
> the 
> > > veiw 
> > > > > > port. "Lokk, what about this o--" He is interupted Lokk 
> > > > > yells, "AXIS, 
> > > > > > NOT THA--" Then Lokk is also interupted as one of the 
> buttons 
> > > is 
> > > > > > pressed by Axis. Lokk finishes his sentence as he is thrown 
> > > > > > backwards into the back wall of their ship, "Not the boost 
> > > jets..." 
> > > > > > He hits the wall along with the other bots. and slides to 
> the 
> > > > > floor. 
> > > > > > "Unghh... Axis," He turns his head slowly as the small 
> group 
> > > > > > speeds forward in their small obsolete craft, "do NOT press 
> any 
> > > > > > more buttons..." He spots the third bot, "Seekker, we've 
> got to 
> > > > > > keep an eye on him and stop him before me messes up again," 
> > > > > > Lokk laughs lightly, "Now we gotta fix this piece of slag. 
> > > C'mon 
> > > > > > Seekker," he strugles against the opposite force, towards 
> the 
> > > > > > control panel.
